about_the_game:
A Little Space is a small game about getting away from the chaos of everyday life, even if just for a while.

Gameplay

  • Level variety ⚽ 🏁 🚀
    The bulk of the game consists of short, self-contained levels which will task you with completing a number of simple objectives. Those objectives will differ significantly from level to level, so one minute you might be ramming into buttons to power up satellites, then the next you'll be hitting giant footballs (soccer balls) into giant goals! Different types of levels will be introduced throughout, so you'll never know what to expect!
  • Time trials & leaderboards ⏱
    Each level will have a target time which you can attempt to beat and earn progress towards additional rewards, but these more difficult challenges won't be required to complete the game. There will also be a global leaderboard of best times for every level in the game, giving you another reason to try to shave off an extra second or two!

Story

Take the role of a pioneering astronaut on a mission to deploy six deep-space Warp Relays to create an interstellar highway from Earth to a recently discovered habitable planet, hundreds of light-years away.

Having been going through a difficult time back home, you'd started to doubt whether you should be given this all-important role on a mission set to change the course of human history.

But perhaps heading out, alone, further from solid ground than anyone has ever been before is exactly what you needed. Sometimes, you just need a little space.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A casual, 2D space game about taking some time for yourself while paving humanity's way to a new world. Fly your way through a variety of bite-sized levels: dodge asteroids, power up satellites and even play football (soccer) in space!
